title: #488 BelowDeckMed: It Go Down In The DM
description:
Lesson learned from this week's - don't text and yacht. At least not when there are nosy crew members around. Hannah learned this the hard way when she got caught sending messages to last week's hawwwt primary Jason, but you guys don't worry about it - they only kissed for, like, TWO SECONDS; so it's totally cool. Come check out our recap where we dive into this scandal as well as other pressing issues such as Adam and Malia's strange showmance and Max's ladyfriend.Below Deck: Mediterranean


Come listen and tell your friends!


See acast.com/privacy for privacy and opt-out information.

Our Patreon Extras: https://patreon.com/watchwhatcrappens
author: watchwhatcrappens@gmail.com (Ben Mandelker & Ronnie Karam)
